tasks.title: Chief of Staff UI Overhaul
tasks.description: Redesign the Chief of Staff dashboard. The current UI has hard-to-read text, poor contrast, and isn't intuitive. Apply Linear/Superhuman design patterns - clean typography, proper spacing, command palette. Make the major functions prominent.

tasks.title: Connect 12 COS Backend Modules to Frontend
tasks.description: 12 backend modules exist in apps_script/ (Voice, Memory, Autonomy, ProactiveIntel, StyleMimicry, Calendar, Predictive, SMS, FileOrg, Integrations, MultiAgent, EmailWorkflow) but the frontend only uses 3. Wire them ALL up to the Chief of Staff dashboard.

tasks.title: Marketing System - Get It Running
tasks.description: Social Intelligence Dashboard, Marketing Command Center, SEO Dashboard all exist but need to be production-ready. Verify APIs work, data flows, and everything is accessible from the admin panel.
